snippet: An updated Elvis Presley exhibit at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland has opened featuring more than 40 artifacts on loan from his Graceland Mansion in Memphis.
abstract: Updated Elvis Presley exhibit at Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland opens; new exhibit features more than 40 artifacts on loan from Presley's Graceland Mansion in Memphis.
lead_paragraph: An updated Elvis Presley exhibit at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland has opened featuring more than 40 artifacts on loan from his Graceland Mansion in Memphis.

headline.print_headline: Updated Presley Exhibit Features Graceland Items
headline.main: Updated Presley Exhibit Features Graceland Items
